doc:
Gene Sheldon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gene_Sheldon 0 Gene Sheldon (born Eugene Hume, February 1, 1908 – May 1, 1982) was an american film and television actor and musician. He is remembered as the mute servant Bernardo on Walt Disney's live-action TV series Zorro (1957-1959). Gene_Sheldon ( born Eugene_Hume , February_1_,_1908 – May_1_,_1982 ) was an_american_film_and_television_actor_and_musician . He is_remembered as the_mute_servant_Bernardo on Walt_Disney 's_live-action_TV_series_Zorro_(_1957-1959_) .
